resources.string: is app used for gathering information about your surrounding
wifi, active cell, GPS position, noise and device identification used for validating uploads. Most can be turned on or off.
Phone permissions are required for uniquely identifying your phone. No phone calls or sms are made.
Noise is very cool, but recording audio might be more sensitive permission, it\'s not mandatory but remember only 1 number (noise value) is collected per second.
Signals can automatically track and upload all data. Can be disabled or tweaked.
Allows you to earn achievements and is used as login too.
